SELECT rnum, review_id, review_target, review_writer, product_name, review_content, review_score, review_reg_date, cnt FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, product_name, review_id, review_writer, review_target, review_content, review_score, review_reg_date, cnt FROM ( SELECT review_id, p.product_name, r.review_writer, r.review_target, review_content, review_score, review_reg_date, (SELECT count(*) FROM review WHERE review_id = r.review_id) cnt FROM review r JOIN member m ON r.review_target = m.email JOIN product_list_data p ON r.product_id = p.product_id ORDER BY review_reg_date DESC ) )
WHERE rnum between (#{page}-1) * 10+1 AND ((#{page}-1) * 10+1) + 9 AND review_target = #{reviewTarget}

select.if: SELECT count(*) FROM review WHERE review_target LIKE '%' ||#{word}||'%' OR review_target LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
